name: part_011
file: tmp_【#あくシオ3Dライブ】おうたのはっぴょうかい！【ホロライブ⧸湊あくあ・紫咲シオン】 [_xL58zG9k5k]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_011.mov

scenes.description: Minato Aqua and Murasaki Shion performing the song 'Childish War'.
Static end card for the 3D Live stream.

subtitles.original: おこちゃま戦争
subtitles.english: Childish War

subtitles.original: あーむかつくぜ！まーじむかつくぜ！
subtitles.english: Ah, I'm so annoyed! Seriously, I'm so annoyed!

subtitles.original: 僕に向かって減らず口なんざ
subtitles.english: Spouting such cheekiness at me,

subtitles.original: とっておきをきみに見舞え
subtitles.english: I'll give you a taste of my best move.

subtitles.original: 報復制裁！　挑発しちゃって
subtitles.english: Retaliatory punishment! I'll provoke you,

subtitles.original: 意地悪して　一枚上
subtitles.english: be mean to you, and stay one step ahead.

subtitles.original: チャンスは貰ってくぜ　スタンスで
subtitles.english: I'll be taking every chance with my stance.

subtitles.original: 痛恨ミス！　あっちゃっちゃー
subtitles.english: A critical mistake! Oh, snap!

subtitles.original: お生憎様だね　きみの負け！　イェーイ！
subtitles.english: Tough luck, it's your loss! Yay!

subtitles.original: だけどきみ　きみだけが
subtitles.english: But you, only you,

subtitles.original: 僕に似合いのライバル
subtitles.english: are the rival that suits me.

subtitles.original: 私に似合いのライバル
subtitles.english: The rival that suits me.

subtitles.original: 落ちるのも　凹むのも
subtitles.english: Falling down or getting depressed,

subtitles.original: 調子狂わされるから
subtitles.english: because you throw me off my game,

subtitles.original: 今宵もあんたと　やーいやーいやーい！
subtitles.english: I'll be with you again tonight, nya-nya-nya!

subtitles.original: 大体いつも上から目線で　暴走するから
subtitles.english: You're always so condescending and running wild,

subtitles.original: 私が後ろから　ブレーキかけなきゃいけないし
subtitles.english: so I have to be the one to step on the brakes.

subtitles.original: 上の空になってるあんた　見てんのもしんどいし
subtitles.english: It's exhausting watching you being all spaced out,

subtitles.original: いい加減にしろよ　このお節介なだけの　ニセ看板
subtitles.english: knock it off, you meddlesome fake figurehead.

subtitles.original: 後輩達もお困りですよ　クソガキすぎて
subtitles.english: Even the juniors are troubled because you're such a brat.

subtitles.original: あぁ？もう　うっせーわ
subtitles.english: Huh? Shut up already!

subtitles.original: けじめをつけましょ！
subtitles.english: Let's settle this!

subtitles.original: 白黒はっきり！
subtitles.english: Clear as black and white!

subtitles.original: あー　もう　うるせー！
subtitles.english: Ah, geez, you're annoying!

subtitles.original: あーむかつくぜ！まーじむかつくぜ！
subtitles.english: Ah, I'm so annoyed! Seriously, I'm so annoyed!

subtitles.original: 憎まれ口はお口をチャック
subtitles.english: Zipper those hateful words,

subtitles.original: 鬨の声　ゴングを鳴らせ
subtitles.english: shout the battle cry, ring the gong.

subtitles.original: ひれ伏せ！　エンペラーはこの私
subtitles.english: Kneel! The emperor is me!

subtitles.original: 悪戯して　悪乗りして
subtitles.english: Playing pranks, getting carried away,

subtitles.original: ほらほら煽ってくスタイルで
subtitles.english: look, look, I'm riling you up with my style.

subtitles.original: 魔入ったか？　いただきまーす
subtitles.english: Had enough? Thanks for the meal!

subtitles.original: 毎度ありがとうで　きみの負け！
subtitles.english: Thanks as always, it's your loss!

subtitles.original: まさかの　引き分け！？
subtitles.english: What, a draw!?

subtitles.original: Illust すみちり / Inst ギガ/Reol
subtitles.english: Illust: Sumichiri / Inst: Giga/Reol

subtitles.original: Movie 萌織/こーせー.h / Dance あゆん
subtitles.english: Movie: Moori/Kose-h / Dance: Ayun

subtitles.original: Special Thanks けだま / Background art by あくシオ
subtitles.english: Special Thanks: Kedama / Background art: Aku-Shio

subtitles.original:
初 3D Live
かわいい あくシオちゃん
subtitles.english:
First 3D Live
Cute Aku-Shio-chan
